Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates an 'Action Bar' item.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzToolBarItem::Type

The types of action menu items

Enumerator:
Separator 

A menu separator (i.e. horizontal divider)

Action 

An action item - a menu entry that activates a DzAction object

CustomAction 

A custom action item - a menu entry that activates a custom action. See DzActionMgr for more about custom actions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzToolBarItem::DzToolBarItem ( Type  type  ) 

Creates a new action menu item of the given type.

Parameters:
type The type of the new menu item.
DzToolBarItem::~DzToolBarItem (  ) 

Destructor

Member Function Documentation

QString DzToolBarItem::getAction (  )  const
Returns:
If the menu item type is Action, the class name of the DzAction which is activated by this menu entry is returned. If the menu item type is CustomAction, the name of the Custom Action (e.g. "Custom0") is returned. If the action has not been set, or if the type of the item is not Action or CustomAction, an empty string is returned.
QString DzToolBarItem::getUIScript (  )  const
Returns:
If the menu item type is CustomWidget, the name of the script that defines the UI for this menu item, or if the type of the item is not CustomWidget, an empty string is returned.
void DzToolBarItem::saveItem ( QDomDocument &  doc,
QDomElement &  parent 
) const

Adds the DOM representation of this menu item to the DOM document as a child of the given element. This function is intended for internal use, and is not supported a part of the SDK.

Parameters:
doc The document to save the menu item to.
parent The element in the document that this tool bar item's data will be made a child of.
void DzToolBarItem::setAction ( const QString &  name  ) 

Sets the action activated by the menu item. This call has no effect unless the type of this item is Action or CustomAction.

Parameters:
name The class name of the DzAction that will be activated by this menu item.
void DzToolBarItem::setUIScript ( const QString &  uiScript  ) 

Sets the script that defines the UI of this menu item. This call has no effect unless the type of this item is CustomWidget.

Parameters:
uiScript The script that will define the UI for this widget item.

Property Documentation

DzToolBarItem::Type DzToolBarItem::type [read]
Returns:
The type of the menu item
